description: small color print in blue tones; obscured, somewhat abstracted image of part of a dome (?) with railing; inscribed by artist; also comes with 2 page hand-written letter by the artist to bill, on newsprint-type paper; lender's archive # 208
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

In pencil, bottom margin: [For Bill, \'05 ... something to do with Venice]
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
title: Untitled
